endpoints.description: Create a new appointment with patient details and schedule.
Retrieve details of a specific appointment using its unique identifier.
Modify details of an existing appointment with specified changes.
Cancel an appointment by its unique identifier.
Access the medical history of a specific patient.
Initialize a new virtual consultation session between provider and patient.
Retrieve a list of available diagnostic tools for virtual consultations.
Submit encrypted medical data for secure exchange between users.
Get a list of upcoming consultations scheduled for a specific patient.
Update the status of an ongoing virtual consultation.
